com.opengamma.strata.engine

Interface ColumnDefinition


  • public interface ColumnDefinition
    A column definition specifies the name of the column and the measure displayed in the column for each target.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Measure getMeasure(CalculationTarget target)
      Returns the measure displayed in the column for the target
      ColumnName getName()
      Returns the column name
      static ColumnDefinition of(Measure measure)
      Returns a definition of a column that contains the same measure in all rows and whose name is the measure name.
      static ColumnDefinition of(Measure measure, String name)
      Returns a definition of a column with the specified name that contains the same measure in all rows.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        static ColumnDefinition of(Measure measure)
        Returns a definition of a column that contains the same measure in all rows and whose name is the measure name.
        Parameters:
        measure - the measure to base the column on
        Returns:
        a definition of a column that contains the same measure in all rows and whose name is the measure name

        Parameters:

        name - the name of the column
        Returns:
